a: Invictus DTU Techfest is the annual technical festival of Delhi Technological University (DTU), one of India's leading engineering institutions and is a student-driven national-level techfest that brings together technology, innovation, competition, and culture on one platform.
Students from all colleges and universities across India can participate in INVICTUS events, workshops, and competitions.
Most events are free to participate, while some workshops may have a nominal registration fee.

q: How can I register for events?
a: You can register for events through the official INVICTUS website after logging in to your account.

q: How can I contact the INVICTUS team?
a: You can reach out to us via our official Instagram or LinkedIn handles, or contact the organizers listed on the website.
